text:
At #WTFisSRE, @holly_cummins shared that when things go wrong, it's up to leadership to set the safety net, encouraging a culture of #learning and not #punishment! Celebrate successes, and celebrate failures as well! 
Brilliant talk Hollyüëç https://t.co/4yXAzRazD6

author.name: Philippe Ensarguet
author.description: Senior tech exec | 2021 Awarded CTO | CTO at @orangebusiness | Board advisor @weaveworks @cycloid_io | Speaker | @TechRocksFr curator | Bike addict
